attributes.action: We wish our vote to leave in the EU referendum be withdrawn
attributes.additional_details:
We feel that although there remains many issues with the United Kingdom's continuing membership with the EU that we were misinformed by the current UK government about the scale of consequences we are already seeing.
We are exercising our democratic right of free choice and realise the implication of our actions in withdrawing our remain vote: as it is impossible to verify if we, the undersigned, all indeed voted to leave it will therfore be necessary to void the current disputed result.
attributes.background: We the undersigned feel we were misinformed by the government about the consequences; the increasingly likely break up of the UK, the devastating economic shocks and the rapid deterioration of UK/EU relationship.We demand that our votes to leave given in the referendum be withdrawn and discounted.

rejection.details:
If you would like there to be a second referendum, you could sign this petition:

https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/133753
